This file defines the using DNS server.

```powershell title="/etc/resolv.conf default conf"
# Generated by dhcpcd from enp0s3.dhcp
# /etc/resolv.conf.head can replace this line
nameserver 127.0.0.1
nameserver 8.8.8.8
# /etc/resolv.conf.tail can replace this line
```

If this file is not being rewritted by the DHCP configuration, feel free to change the DNS server for this device.

But if it is being rewritted, you need to change the [/etc/dhcpd.conf](dhcpcd.conf.md) config.
